Package Chess

Class board

java.lang.Object
Chess.board
public class board
extends java.lang.Object
Board is a class used to hold all the chess pieces and is responsible for the actual movement of pieces.
Author:
Wesley Cheung, Dennis Yu

    • check

      public boolean check​(Chess.Piece[][] gameBoard, char team)
      Checks to see if the king of the given color is in check.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - is the current game board
      team - is the team that be determined if it is in check
      Returns:
      boolean value corresponding to the king being in check

    • checkmate

      public boolean checkmate​(Chess.Piece[][] gameBoard, char team)
      checkmate() returns true if the king of a specified team is in checkmate
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - is the current game board
      team - is the team that will be checked if it's in checkamte
      Returns:
      true if king is in checkmate otherwise false
